articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant, a model plant in the 21st century.
					 He went round various places of the plant including the newly built CNC-based assembling shop and CNC-based processing shop to acquaint himself in detail with its technological updating and production there.
					
					 Looking round the interior of the plant and watching new type CNC-based machine tools standing in rows, he said that it has undergone radical changes in a matter of a few months. He was greatly pleased with the leaping progress made in the technological updating.
					
					The workers of the plant, their hearts burning with patriotism, have put the machine-building industry on the world's level with persevering will, he said, adding that it is another great victory won in the Songun era that the DPRK has ranked itself among the countries most advanced in the latest science and technology in the wake of firmly holding supremacy in CNC-based technology.
					
					 He said: "The revolutionary practice in the DPRK goes to prove that only those strong in thinking and faith can acquire ultra modern technology stirring the era and they are true patriots and indomitable fighters who glorify the Juche idea not in words but in practice".
					
					 Noting that the slogan "Push back the frontiers of science and technology!" put up by the party serves as a militant banner for dynamically pushing forward the process of placing the economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis, he underscored the need to powerfully push ahead with the modernization based on the latest science and technology in all sectors and at all units.
					
					 Pointing out that it is necessary for the plant to continue steadily dashing ahead toward a higher eminence of science and technology on the basis of the successes made in placing its production processes on a CNC basis, he set the targets to be attained in the near future and specified the orientation and ways to do so. 
					
					 The DPRK boldly developed CNC technology, thus becoming able to  manufacture high performance CNC-based equipment as it pleases, he said, underlining the need to continue paying deep attention to bringing the machine-tool industry to a higher stage. 
					
					 He called on the workers of the plant to effect a great surge in the production of machine tools by fully displaying patriotic devotion and thus successfully carry forward and develop the shining tradition in which they produced 10,000 machine tools in the past. 
					
					 Noting that the party has great expectation towards the plant, he expressed conviction that it would contrive and manufacture more highly efficient CNC-based machine tools to make a positive contribution to further consolidating the industrial foundation of the country. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: US New Mexico State Governor and His Party Leave
articles.content:
US New Mexico State Governor and His Party Leave
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Bill Richardson, governor of New Mexico State of the U.S., and his party flew back home today.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Arranges Friendly Meeting
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Arranges Friendly Meeting
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Valery E. Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, arranged a friendly meeting at his embassy on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 100 (2011).
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials of the ministry.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Russian embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The participants talked to each other about the need to boost the relations between the two countries, deepening friendship.

articles.title: Anniversary of Event during FLW Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Event during FLW Commemorated
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Hyangha Revolutionary Site on Tuesday to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the event in which President Kim Il Sung brought about a turning phase in the struggle to win the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War while staying in Jagang Province.
					 Kim Il Sung set forth a strategic policy calling on the Korean People's Army to go over to a counter-attack, bringing about a turning phase in the war while staying in various parts of the province including Kosanjin (at that time) of Manpho County from November to December of Juche 39 (1950). 
					
					 He called the 30th plenary meeting of the Cabinet in Yonphung-dong, Kanggye City to discuss measures for improving the standard of people's living and indicate the orientation for working out a plan for the rehabilitation and development of national economy.
					
					 He guided the third plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK in Hyangha-ri of Janggang County at which he made speech "The Present Situation and the Immediate Tasks," arousing the whole party and army and all the people to the victory in the war. 
					
					 In the days of his Songun leadership General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to Kosanjin, Yonphung and Hyangha revolutionary sites. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were leading officials of party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations and working people in the province.
					
					 Choe Ki Ryong, chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, delivered a report at the meeting.

articles.title: Anniversary of Supreme Commandership of KPA Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Supreme Commandership of KPA Celebrated
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings to celebrate the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army were held at the Central Youth Hall here and in Songhak-ri, Anju City of South Phyongan Province on Tuesday.
					 Present at the meetings were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, youth and students and agricultural workers.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the KPA provided a sure guarantee for accomplishing the Juche cause, they said. 
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il has reinforced the country's military position as firm as an iron wall by pursuing original Songun politics and won a shining victory in the struggle for the defence of socialism in reliance upon the invincible power of the army. 
					
					 They noted: "The KPA has grown to be most elite revolutionary forces to win victory in the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. and Juche Korea has fully demonstrated its dignity and might to the world. This would be unthinkable without the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il."  
					
					 Performances were given by the art squads of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea that day on the above-said occasion and the occasion of the 93rd anniversary of birth of Anti-Japanese War Hero Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Relics of Kiln Site Dating Back to Koryo Dynasty Unearthed
articles.content:
Relics of Kiln Site Dating Back to Koryo Dynasty Unearthed
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Relics of kiln site dating back to Koryo dynasty were unearthed in the Kotho area of Koup-ri, Jangphung County of Kaesong City in the DPRK recently.
					 Lying at an incline of about 10 degrees, the site is 60 meters long, 2 meters wide and 1 to 1.5 meters high.
					
					 The rectangular fire box in the lower part of the site is 1.9 meters long, 1.8 meters wide and the brick layers are about 30 to 50 centimeters high.
					
					 There remains just one layer of bricks on both sides of the kiln at present.
					
					 The unearthing led to discovering pieces of ceramic plates, Koryo porcelain and others used for manufacturing pottery.
					
					 The location of the kiln site, its shape and structure and relics obtained from there ascertained that they dated back to the early period of Koryo dynasty.

articles.title: Photo Album Published
articles.content:
Photo Album Published
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central Photo Publicity Agency has brought out a photo album "Beautiful Landscape of Pyongyang at Night" dealing with the decoration of Pyongyang with colorful lights.
					 The album contains more than 70 photos showing how beautiful Pyongyang looked on the occasions of the historic Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th birthday.
					
					 Among them are night views of President Kim Il Sung's Statue on Mansu Hill and groups of sculptures around it, the Pyongyang Railway Station, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Arch of Triumph, the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and other edifices and streets of the city.
					
					 Everybody is admired to see these scenes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces US-S. Korea War Confab
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces US-S. Korea War Confab
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean military warhawks held the 27th "meeting on security policy initiative" in Seoul some days ago, says major newspaper Rodong Sinmun.
					 At the meeting the two sides had a dangerous confab on boosting cooperation in a war against the DPRK and bringing a nuclear disaster to Korea by taking advantage of the situation on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary said.
					
					"The south Korean conservative government is blaming the DPRK for 'provocation' to convince the world that it is a victim, but it is just a smokescreen to cover up its scenario for confrontation and a war," it added.
					
					 The news analyst said that south Korea is being driven to a tight corner, censured by the people and its anti-reunification policy is on the verge of total bankruptcy. 
					
					 "It is finding a way out in confrontation with fellow countrymen and working as a stooge for trigger-happy outsiders. It is proved by south Korean warhawks' military provocation from Yonphyong Island and their stepped-up moves to tighten the 'triangular military alliance' with the U.S. and Japan," the news analyst noted, and continued:
					
					 "What should not be overlooked is that what was discussed at the war confab is being put into practice. South Korean forces staged another shelling from the island and invited riff-raffs to take part as 'observers.' This was obviously aimed to ignite a war against the DPRK under the pretext of 'provocation'," the news analyst held.
					
					 "Should the south Korean authorities persistently pursue confrontation with fellow countrymen despite the DPRK's repeated demand and the trend of the times, they will have to pay a dear price," he warned.

articles.title: Japan's Dangerous Moves to Stage Comeback to Korea Flailed
articles.content:
Japan's Dangerous Moves to Stage Comeback to Korea Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The new "defence program guidelines" of the Japanese reactionaries are, in essence, a product of their military scenario for bolstering the offensive operation capability of the Japan "Self-defence Forces" aimed at overseas aggression, observes Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					 Lurking behind this scenario is a criminal intention of the Japanese reactionaries to massively deploy the mobile strike forces, mainly the Maritime and Air SDF, in the Southwestern region of Japan close to the Korean Peninsula and China in a bid to attain their purpose of reinvasion.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that they claimed the "guidelines" were aimed at coping with what they call "threat" from the DPRK and China. The above-said developments go to prove that the "guidelines" are no more than a war document designed to justify the military operation for reinvasion targeting the above-said countries.
					
					 Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan recently talked about the dispatch of the SDF to the Korean Peninsula for protecting Japanese in "contingency". What he uttered is sophism to cover up the aggressive purpose of the SDF's overseas dispatch.
					
					 The "guidelines" and Japan's scenario for the dispatch of the SDF in "contingency" on the peninsula is a dangerous war plan of the Japanese militarist forces to invade not only the DPRK and China but the rest of Asia.
					
					 Their actions to realize their wild ambition for reinvasion under the above-mentioned pretext would only lead them to self-destruction.

articles.title: US, Japan and S. Korea's Moves to Tighten Alliance Rapped
articles.content:
US, Japan and S. Korea's Moves to Tighten Alliance Rapped
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- 15 south Korean civic and social organizations staged the 135th action for independent reunification and peace in Seoul on Dec. 14.
					 They denounced the U.S., Japan and south Korea's tightened alliance for a war. 
					
					 They included the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime have stepped up the moves for a war, staging war exercises against the DPRK and inviting even troops of the Japan Self-defence Forces to take part, they charged.
					
					 The organizations chided the Lee Myung Bak regime for using the Yonphyong Island shelling as a pretext for justifying the tightened alliance. 
					
					 They lashed out at the U.S. for pressurizing south Korea to conclude FTA. They also denounced Japan for working hard to hurl SDF into the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of alliance.
					
					 Broad people will turn out in the actions for peace and reunification of the peninsula, they declared.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Call for Actions against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Call for Actions against War
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Chairpersons of 15 university general student councils in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 16. They made public a declaration on the situation calling for actions against a war. 
					 It accused the present conservative ruling forces of inciting a war and confrontation, crying out for "retaliation."
					
					 The rulers are mercilessly quelling people's anti-"government" voices, while inciting a war. This reminds one of the days of the erstwhile fascist dictatorial regime, the declaration noted. 
					
					 The students are strongly opposed to escalated military tension on the Korean Peninsula and will take the lead in the struggle for averting a war and achieving peace and democracy, the declaration said.

articles.title: Demolition of Concrete Wall Demanded
articles.content:
Demolition of Concrete Wall Demanded
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, released a statement on Dec. 15 31 years since the concrete wall was built in areas south of the Military Demarcation Line.
					 The statement said: The concrete wall built by the south Korean puppet authorities is a symbol of the division of the Korean nation and the north-south confrontation.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has become a potential hotbed threatening the peace and security of the world. This would be unthinkable without the wall. 
					
					 The concrete wall should be pulled down as early as possible as it not only brought misfortune and pain to the Korean nation but made it impossible to deliver the situation on the Korean Peninsula from the crisis of constant confrontation and conflict.
					
					 The statement expressed firm solidarity for the Korean people in their just efforts to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Tanzanian Committee of Juche Idea Study Groups Meets
articles.content:
Tanzanian Committee of Juche Idea Study Groups Meets 
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups had its annual meeting in Dar es Salaam on Dec. 11.
					 The meeting reviewed the activities of the committee and the study groups this year and discussed a plan for their activities next year.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of War Hero Commemorated in Colombia
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of War Hero Commemorated in Colombia
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia issued a bulletin on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin titled "Great Mother Who Brought up Illustrious Commander of Songun" said: Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk took arms in her hands in the first half of the 20th century and protected President Kim Il Sung, legendary hero of the anti-Japanese war, recording prominent pages in the history of modern Korea. She brought Kim Jong Il up as the future illustrious commander of Songun in the arduous period of the anti-Japanese struggle and in the early period of nation-building.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk taught Kim Jong Il the idea of attaching importance to the army and military affairs, the bulletin noted. Prompted by her ardent desire to see him become an excellent general who would follow in the footsteps of the President, she made a general's uniform for him. Before her demise she earnestly told him to hold the President in reverence, the bulletin added.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk was deeply thoughtful of helping Kim Jong Il possess matchless pluck and grit, the bulletin noted, citing facts.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il, as desired by Kim Jong Suk, has carried forward the cause of the President and glorified the sovereignty of the DPRK, thus winning world-wide reputation as the great illustrious commander of Songun leading the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised 
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Torstein Engelskjon, chairman of the Norway-Korea Friendship Society, released a statement on Dec. 15. It was on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Kim Jong Il has strengthened the KPA as an invincible army, frustrating the moves of the imperialists for aggression and guaranteeing the security of socialist Korea, the statement said.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode of socialism and embodied it in all fields, placing the overall national power on the highest level, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The cause of socialism was saved from a crisis and the invincibility of the DPRK demonstrated before the world as Kim Jong Il with faith in sure victory and iron will has led the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il defended the country from the moves of the imperialist allied forces to bring down socialism and stifle the DPRK. He also unrolled a plan for building a thriving nation and laid a springboard for its realization.
					
					 The statement expressed full solidarity for the Korean people in their just struggle.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings, round-table talks, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Ecuador, Iran, Switzerland, Bangladesh and Thailand between Dec. 9 and 13. They are to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 Displayed were photos on the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Films shown included "Reply of DPRK" and "Army of DPRK."
					
					 Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the KPA provided the Korean people with a guarantee for materializing the Songun idea of Kim Il Sung, the chairman of the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung said. He wished the Koreans successes in their struggle for defending socialism, building a great prosperous and powerful nation and accomplishing the cause of the national reunification by dint of Songun.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Suk as a revolutionary intensely loyal to the President and a great woman who brought Kim Jong Il up as the successor to the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at its Conference is an expression of the absolute trust of all the party members, soldiers and people of the DPRK in him and a demonstration of their single-minded unity around the leader, the chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il with matchless pluck and grit would always emerge victorious, the chief of the Bangladesh Barisal Society for the Study of Songun Policy stressed.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Personalidad noruega elogia hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Personalidad noruega elogia hazanas de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 19o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Noruega-Corea, Torstein Engelskion, hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion.
					  La nota subraya que el Dirigente consolido al ejercito como invencibles fuerzas armadas para frustrar las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas y garantizar la seguridad de la Corea socialista.
					
					  Prosigue que el Dirigente formulo la politica de Songun como modo politico principal del socialismo, la materializo en su totalidad y llevo toda la fuerza nacional a alto nivel.
					
					  Gracias a que el Dirigente, con la conviccion invencible y la voluntad ferrea, se pone a la cabeza del ejercito y el pueblo, la causa socialista se salvo de la crisis y la invencibilidad de Corea se manifesto a todo el mundo, apunta.
					
					  Anade que el Dirigente defendio el pais haciendo frente a las maniobras de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas encaminadas a aplastar al socialismo y a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presento el proyecto de construccion de una gran potencia prospera y preparo el trampolin para materializarlo.
					
					  Expresa la irrestricta solidaridad con la justa lucha del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia complot de guerra contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia complot de guerra contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En la 27a "reunion para la iniciativa de la politica de seguridad" entre el Sur de Corea y Estados Unidos efectuada hace poco en Seul, los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea hicieron conspiracion de guerra para fortalecer el sistema de cooperacion en la agresion al Norte y desatar, cueste lo que cueste, la guerra nuclear tomando por oportunidad el empeoramiento de la situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana.
					  Por otra parte, los compinches de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos andan ajetreados como si fueran victimas hablando tanto de la "provocacion" de alguien, pero, esto no pasa de ser la cortina de humo para encubrir la naturaleza de ellos mismos que corren por la senda de la confrontacion y la guerra. 
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					  Las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea caen cada dia mas en un aprieto, siendo objeto de la denuncia y el rechazo por parte del pueblo, y su politica de confrontacion anti-reunificacion se halla en crisis de derrota total.
					
					  Por lo tanto, buscan la salida de tal situacion en el enfrentamiento fratricida y sirven sin vacilacion de lacayos de guerra a las fuerzas foraneas. Lo demuestra el hecho de que los belicistas surcoreanos provocaron un incidente artillero en los alrededores de la isla Yonphyong y luego, los titeres participan activamente en las maniobras de fortalecimiento de la "alianza militar tripartita" entre Japon y el Sur de Corea tomando EE.UU. como eje.
					
					  Lo mas intolerable es que la nueva conspiracion de guerra discutida en la reunion arriba mencionada entra en la etapa practica.
					
					  Los belicistas titeres volvieron a desarrollar el entrenamiento maritimo de tiro en la isla Yonphyong e invitaron la chusma bajo el rotulo de la "visita", lo cual fue para desatar la guerra de agresion al Norte bajo el pretexto de la "provocacion" de alguien.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas persiguen la confrontacion fratricida por las fuerzas nadando a contrapelo de la demanda reiterada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la corriente de la situacion, pagaran el precio caro.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de nueva agresion de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de nueva agresion de Japon
						
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El nuevo "programa de defensa" de los reaccionarios japoneses es, en su esencia, un producto de su intencion militar de fomentar la capacidad de operaciones ofensivas de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" para la agresion a ultramar. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					En particular, ese "programa" refleja el designio criminal de los reaccionarios japoneses tendentes a  lograr su objetivo de nueva agresion mediante el emplazamiento concentrado de las fuerzas de ataque movil incluidas las "fuerzas navales y aereas de autodefensa" a la parte suroeste de Japon que esta cerca de la Peninsula Coreana y China. 
					
					Lo grave del caso es que los reaccionarios japoneses anotaron en el nuevo "programa de defensa" el problema de hacer frente a la "amenaza" de Corea y China. 
					
					Tal hecho muestra que el nuevo "programa de defensa" es el documento de guerra para justificar las operaciones militares de nueva agresion contra Corea y China.
					
					Hace poco, el premier japones Naoto Kan hablo del envio de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" para "salvar" a los japoneses en el supuesto "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual no pasa de ser una sofisteria para encubrir el objetivo agresivo del envio de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a ultramar. 
					
					La determinacion del nuevo "programa de defensa" y la intencion de enviar a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana revelan el designio de guerra muy peligrosa de las fuerzas militaristas japonesas, tendente a volver a agredir no solo a Corea y China, sino tambien el resto del continente asiatico. 
					
					Si los reaccionarios japoneses se esfuerzan por lograr su ambicion de nueva agresion movilizando a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" bajo el pretexto de "salvar" a los japoneses en el supuesto "tiempo de emergencia", se veran autodestruidos.

articles.title: Coleccion de fotos "Hermosa noche de Pyongyang"
articles.content:
Coleccion de fotos "Hermosa noche de Pyongyang"
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, la Agencia Nacional de Propaganda Fotografica de Corea dio a luz la coleccion de fotos "Hermosa noche de Pyongyang", que redacta mas de 70 fotografias alusivas al paisaje nocturno de Pyongyang que se adorna por las lamparillas mas hermosas y elegantes con motivo de la historica Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de esta agrupacion politica. 
					Sobresalen las fotos que muestran los adornos de lamparillas en la estatua de bronce del Presidente    Kim Il Sung, erguida en la colina Mansu, y en los grupos escultoricos en su contorno.
					
					Ademas, se ven los cuadros de las calles de la capital incluso la Estacion Ferroviaria de Pyongyang.
					
					Las fotos, que dan a conocer las creaciones monumentales como el Monumento a la Idea Juche, el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Arco de Triunfo, el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este y la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang, tienen matices hermosos y misteriosos que no se puede sentir en pleno dia.

articles.title: Descubiertas ruinas de horno de la epoca de Coryo
articles.content:
Descubiertas ruinas de horno de la epoca de Coryo
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, se ha descubierto en la zona de Kotho de la comuna de Koup del distrito de Jangphung de la ciudad de Kaesong las ruinas de horno con unos 10o de angulo de inclinacion, 60 m de largo, 2 m de ancho y 1-1.5 m de alto.
					La hornilla de forma semioval tiene 1.9 metros de largo y 1.8 metros de ancho. La altura de los pisos de ladrillos es de unos 30-50 centimetros. 
					
					Ahora subsiste solo un piso de ladrillos entre las paredes de ambos lados del cuadro de calcinacion.
					
					En el curso de descubrimiento, aparecieron las piezas de porcelanas de Coryo y algunas ceramicas.
					
					Los vestigios recien descubiertos son de principios de la epoca de Coryo al tomar en consideracion el sitio, la forma, la estructura y los restos.
